rows.name:
Even monsters give up
chasing you eventually...

If you're going to run,
make sure to sheathe your weapon first!

I hear that defeated monsters sometimes
drop money and items!

And don't they also drop HP Potions when
you Topple them?

Did you know some Driver Arts can
have additional effects?

First you Break the enemy!
Then you Topple them!

I see...
And then what?

Once they're Toppled, they're easy targets.
You won't miss a single attack!

Driver Combos don't work as well
on some enemies... Some are completely
immune, even!
Wow... They must be pretty tough.

Of course, we don't have to worry about
that since we're not Drivers!

If you approach a monster from behind,
it won't even notice you.

Not all of them. I learned that
the hard way when one of them
spotted me and gave chase!

Really? Huh...
I guess you can never be too careful.

Different enemies block attacks from
different directions. Some only from the
front, others from the front and sides.

I heard some monsters can
power up their allies!

Sounds like a pain. Best to take
those out first, then!

Traveling to Aurium is such a pain, mo.
If only we could take a break at Bern on the way, mo!

Traveling to Aurium is much easier now, mo!
We can rest up at Bern before the last leg of the journey, mo!

I heard it was Laura-sama who chased the nasty Gogols
away from Bern, mo! We're so grateful, mo!

It's hard to work when
the lantern's out...

Yeah, I wish someone would
fix it already.

The lantern's fixed!
Now we can get some work done.

Apparently, some guy called
Chalcedony arranged it. We owe him one!

Did you hear? It was a Knight of Iira,
Laura-sama herself, who fixed the lanterns!

It sounds like she's been busy
all over the place...
The clothier Obibi has been looking down lately, mo...

Probably because she's not popular with Nopon customers, mo.
She must be having trouble making money, mo.

This hat is so stylish, mo!
No wonder it's all the rage, mo!
Obibi seems much happier lately, mo!

I heard that stylish hat was actually the idea
of that newly-knighted Laura, mo.

Wow, mo! A knight and a fashionista...
So talented, mo!

That handyman Dio is incredible.
He'll take on any task, free of charge!

Really? Maybe I'll ask him for help
next time I'm in a pinch.

That handyman, Dio, is great and all,
but it's all about Laura-sama these days.

You can say that again! She and Adel-sama
are always helping people in need!
It can't be easy. I know I couldn't do it!

So Ivan and his crew brought
all this food from the capital?

That's right. Apparently, Adel-sama
organized the whole thing!
He's truly the kindest man in the realm.

The capital city of Aurium is always
such a peaceful place.

I would hate to have to leave
this wonderful city...

True. I just hope we can find
a safe place within the city walls.

I hear they built a shelter
beneath the Dormir Inn! We should
be safe now.

And it's all thanks to Laura-sama.
We owe her so much.

You'd best get those materials delivered,
or you'll be in for an earful from Zain!

Aren't you going to evacuate
with everyone else, old man?

Evacuate? Hah!
I'm not budging an inch from this spot!

I hear young Wotta built a Divine Beast
vessel! Now we can easily evacuate!

Weren't you just saying you wouldn't
budge an inch?

Well, yes...but Laura-sama and Adel-sama
personally helped with this. It would be
rude to refuse their goodwill!
...Right.

Why can't we play in the gardens
anymore?

Oh! Laura-sama!
Thank you for fixing up the gardens!
The view from here is magnificent.
It is, but...shouldn't you be working?

I'll have you know, inspecting the view
is a very important part of my job!

It's wonderful to be able to look out
on this view once again.

Indeed. We have the hard work of
Bry and Caim to thank for it.
What a beautiful garden...

That's all thanks to Bry the gardener.
He's a talented one.

This used to be such a
beautiful garden...
That Heaven's Holy Grail has a lot to answer for.

It's so good to see Sachsum Gardens
looking beautiful again.

Of course! With Laura-sama and Adel-sama
helping out, it was only a matter of time!

...Why are you taking credit for
their hard work?

Remember, stay out of the back alleys.
There are some shady Nopon back there.

I know! My mom is always telling
me to stay away.

The Nopon in the back alleys are real
criminals. They throw litter on the streets!

My mom said so too...
What if they pick a fight with me?

Hey, I heard those shady Nopon
in the alleys are gone.
Awesome! Let's go play there!

If we do that,
we'll be delinquents too!

I love Iiran Trout.
It's delicious and cheap!

That's because they farm them. I prefer
the taste of Amber Sweetfish, though.

I heard the farm's entire stock of trout
was wiped out in the attack...

How awful... Does that mean
the prices will go up?

Thanks to Laura-sama and Adel-sama,
the fish farm is up and running again!
That's a relief! I'm sure Fisshi is, too.

My apologies, but we're all out
of Armu right now.
Oh dear, that's quite a problem...

The Armu are back! Young Joey
managed to sort everything out!

That's good to hear.
I need to borrow one to move my luggage.

Where's Formide Shopping Street again?
I need to buy some accessories...

It's right behind you!
Honestly, you have no sense of direction.

Should we get out of the capital?
What if the Heaven's Holy Grail comes back?

Don't worry. I'm sure Adel-sama
will do something about it.

We're all going to be able to evacuate on that
Divine Beast ship Wotta built!

Well, that's nice for you.
I'm staying right here.
What?! Please, you have to come with us!
I want to be more fashionable, mo!

Mo, it's no use complaining here.
We should go to Formide Shopping Street, mo...
This lovely hat makes me so happy, mo!
Obibi's shop has been doing well lately, mo!

Today's the day we settle this, brother.
Once and for all!
I was hoping you'd say that.
You can do it, Aniki!

Those brothers are at it again...
Don't they ever get tired of it?

When the city was attacked,
you ran away!
You coward!

Grrr...
You're right...
Didn't you run away, too?

Only Adel-sama and his group had the guts
to stand and fight.

This is no time for fighting.
Shouldn't we be working together, brother?

You're right...
Let's join forces to defeat the Heaven's Holy Grail.
Be careful, you two!
We'll be fine! Besides,\we're also acting as lookouts.

Laura-sama! You drove off the Gogols
at the main gate, didn't you?

I was watching from a distance,
and you looked so cool!

I know, right?! I want to be a Driver,
too, someday!

Laura-sama! You're going to defeat the
Heaven's Holy Grail for us, right?
We'll be cheering you on from here!

A Gulan and an Invidian working together?
That's a rare sight.
Ah, the sweet sound of a Torigonda...
They're incredible performers.
They're so cool!

I'm glad these two were around
when the Heaven's Holy Grail attacked.

The valiant sound of the Iiran Viella
gave us courage.

Leon's Iiran Viella playing has been
especially lively recently.
I heard he had a bit of good fortune.

The addition of Rikoko's flute has
brought a new flavor to their music.

Yes, the young Nopon brings a certain
joyful energy to the performance!
Laura-samaaa!

Sorry about that, Laura-sama.
She really looks up to you.

Laura-sama! After you defeat the Holy Grail,
you have to tell us all about it!

My ladies, my lords...
I am just an old man, but please, I beg of you,
protect the future for these children.
Look! It's Laura-sama!
And Adel-sama and Hugo-sama, too!
I'm going to play with them, mo!

Is everything really going to be okay?
Are we going to survive?
O-of course we will!

That's right, mo!
They'll take care of them in a flash, mo!

Step right up!
Delicious steamed buns for sale!

Adel-sama!
Please, stop by for a moment!

Laura-sama!
Would you like to have a meal with us?

Shin-sama!
You must teach me how to cook sometime!

Which one should I get?
Choosing accessories is so hard...
How about a Vow Ring?

If only I had better accessories,
I could have driven off the Holy Grail's minions.

I don't think that's all it would take.
You'd need strong weapons and Blades, too.

To protect myself, I need to equip
the best accessories.

Instead of buying them, isn't it better to
defeat enemies and take theirs?
Are you out of Platinum Meco...?

That's a rare one. The fragrance, the texture...
It's a true delicacy.

If you're in trouble, you're better off
asking Dio or Laura-san than the Iiran army.

True, but relying on them for everything
is a bit pathetic, isn't it?

You're right.
We need to contribute, too.
Hey, what do you think will happen to Iira?

I don't know...
But I have faith in Adel-sama.
I'm sure he'll figure something out.
This inn is lovely, isn't it?

The atmosphere is so different
from back home. It's very relaxing.
Hey, shouldn't we be heading home soon?

I can't book passage on a Divine Beast ship.
They're always full.

Hmm...
What should we do...?

In the end, we never made it back home.
But maybe that's for the best.

I've grown quite fond of this city.
And I'm sure that handsome prince will
sort everything out.
Focus!

At this rate, the Holy Grail's Devices
will defeat you again!
We will protect Iira's future with our own hands!
Let's go eat at Caf√© Amicus!
But I'm not hungry yet...
We should probably head home soon.

I don't want to be in a small space!
What if those scary things come back and
I get trapped?

When Adel-sama and the others start fighting,
you need to take shelter in the inn's basement.

Will it hold...?
I'm scared...

You're always reading.
Let's do something else!
Just let me finish *The Adventures of the Blue Kepi-Seal*.

Come on, cheer up.
I know that was scary, but there's no
point in moping around.

I'm researching the legend of Eden.
Maybe it holds a clue as to why we were attacked...

Let's go to Formide Shopping Street!
I heard the chairman of the Chamber of
Commerce is giving out snacks.

I'll go after I finish my Laura-sama
observation diary...
Is this all the cargo for today?

The damage wasn't too bad around here,
luckily.

We need to be ready to distribute
supplies, just in case.
Medium Gate is still closed.

We'll have to go around through Formide Shopping Street
to get to the palace.

Why not join the Iiran army?
Let us protect our country together!

Why are you trying to recruit me?
It's not like we're needed in this peaceful capital.

Why not join the Iiran army?
Can you forgive them for trampling on our capital?

No thanks.
I'm not a Driver. It would be a dog's death.
The Iiran army...

I'll lend you my strength.
I want to do something useful for my country, too.

Things have gotten dangerous lately.
I heard Gogols almost made it to the
city gates.

I know. Laura-sama drove them off, right?
She's amazing.

I heard that Thales the glassmaker
passed away.

He didn't have an apprentice, did he?
I suppose his skills will be lost forever.
Have you seen Sharla's glasswork?

I have.
She's not at Thales's level yet,
but she has a lot of potential.

Hey, hey,
have you seen Cera's boyfriend?

I have!
He's so handsome.
Are you serious?

I haven't seen Mirei's grandmother
around lately, have you?

She got back together with her ex-husband, I think.
They're going to start a pottery business in Hyber Village.

That Tricolored Acqua Pazza was
really delicious.
It's all thanks to that eager Superbian and Adel-sama.

I hear the cooking contest Adel-sama proposed
was a huge success, mo.

I'm going to suggest to the Chairman
that Formide Shopping Street hosts it next time, mo.
It'll be an even bigger event, and we'll make lots of money, mo!

There's someone named Jelico down there.
Go and ask him.

I wonder if it's okay...
He's not as scary as he used to be, but...

Parvi and Dudan looked happy.
I wonder if they found that gold?

Those two are always like that.
I bet they failed again, didn't they?

Parvi seems to have a lot of money
these days, doesn't she?

The rumor is she struck legendary gold in the Dannagh Desert.
I thought it was a fool's errand, but
I guess dreams do come true.
That's the Royal Palace, Auresco.

It's so tall!
How many floors does it have?

Hey, boss... Was the Chamber of
Commerce Chairman a bad guy?

No, he was just working too hard.
From now on, I'm sure he'll dedicate himself to the
shopping street in moderation.

I heard a Divine Beast bought up a huge amount of
meat and fish from the market the other day...

I suppose when you're that big,
you need to eat a lot.

Things have been hard lately, but
I'm glad it all worked out for Mars.

I agree.
Seeing Kai and Kei so happy has
cheered us all up.

We're so useless, aren't we?
When this place was attacked by monsters,
we couldn't do a thing...

We'll just have to become skilled Drivers
like Adel-sama and Hugo-sama!

It's good to be in Aletta,
but we're short on manpower.

Still, Adel-sama's retainers are helping
us out, so there's no point in complaining.

Thanks to the lieutenant and Adel-sama,
our manpower shortage should be solved.
We're getting six new people!

Though those four Nopon combined are
worth about one person...

We need to learn from Laura-sama's fighting style.
The way the Driver and Blade pass weapons
back and forth...

This is Adel-sama's domain,
so it's safer here than in Invidia.

Yeah...
We can finally get some rest, Mama.

I want you to grow up to be strong,
like Laura-sama, Kasumi-sama, and Kagutsuchi-sama.
But not like Hikari-sama?

Adel-sama, everyone...
Good luck...
Please bring peace to Alst.

Should we not be accompanying
Lord Hugo?

This is Iira. It wouldn't do for the Superbian
army to be moving around freely. Let's just stick to
our orders and act as messengers.

Where has the Special Inquisitor
gone?

He went with Hugo-sama, didn't he?
That man is like a walking disaster. I'd feel safer
if he went back to the homeland.

Rumors of Hugo-sama's exploits
have reached us even here...

It makes me proud.
But I wish he would allow us to accompany him!

Were the weapon and accessory merchants
evacuated?
Yes, they've taken shelter in the inn's basement.
The bridge has finally been restored...

We shouldn't rest here.
Let's hurry to the capital.

I'm glad we left the capital early.
To think it would be attacked...

I know...
Let's hurry back to Aletta.

Should we...should we escape from Iira?
From Aletta? Is it that bad?

It's hard to say...
But I have faith in Adel-sama. I know it will be okay.
